Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the length of time the man pretended to be deaf and dumb, as it states he did so for 62 years.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to verify the authenticity of the story.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo provided is genuine and accurately represents the situation described.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo used is actually a mirror-image version of a photograph credited to Lannis Waters of The Palm Beach Post.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for the photo, such as it being a staged image or unrelated to the claim made.
Falters at times: The claim may falter at times due to the inclusion of misleading posts and articles from satirical news websites.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
